configuration_manifest.purpose: A dataset containing files used in configuration
configuration_manifest.filters: tags:(the AND config AND tags) files:(extension:csv AND sequence:>=0)

input_manifest.purpose: A dataset containing meteorological mast data
input_manifest.filters: tags:(met* AND mast AND location) files:(extension:csv AND sequence:>=0) location:10
tags:(met* AND mast) files:(extension:csv AND sequence:>=0) location:10

output_manifest.filters: tags:(the AND output AND tags) files:(extension:csv AND sequence:>=0)
